remoteClasses.name: WebRtcEndpoint
remoteClasses.doc: WebRtcEndpoint interface. This type of ``Endpoint`` offers media streaming using WebRTC.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the endpoint belongs

properties.name: minVideoSendBandwidth
properties.doc:
Minimum video bandwidth for sending.
  Unit: kbps(kilobits per second).
   0: unlimited.
  Default value: 100

properties.name: maxVideoSendBandwidth
properties.doc:
Maximum video bandwidth for sending.
  Unit: kbps(kilobits per second).
   0: unlimited.
  Default value: 500
